paper_abstract: Contour lines totally fix the structure of a t-norm. Expressing the characteristic properties of a left-continuous t-norm in terms of contour lines, provides us more insight into its geometrical structure. In particular, we focus on the decomposition of t-norms that have a continuous contour line. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the structure of left-continuous t-norms that have a continuous contour line
